com.victorlaerte.asynctask

Class AsyncTask<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.victorlaerte.asynctask.AsyncTask<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of progress parameter

    public abstract class AsyncTask<P>
extends java.lang.Object
    This isn't our code, credit goes to the guy marked by the data below.
    Author:
    Victor Oliveira
    See Also:
    https://github.com/victorlaerte/javafx-asynctask

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncTask() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void doInBackground()
      Runs on background thread.
      void execute()
      Start the Async Task
      void interrupt()
      Interrupt the thread.
      abstract void onPostExecute()
      Runs after background thread ends on the main thread
      abstract void onPreExecute()
      Runs on main thread before background thread starts
      abstract void progressCallback(P... params)
      Use this to update anything on the main thread as the background thread runs (this is a callback, DO NOT CALL THIS DIRECTLY)
      void publishProgress(P... params)
      Call this to publish progress to the main thread
      void setDaemon(boolean daemon)
      Set if this should be a daemon thread or not

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncTask

        public AsyncTask()

    • Method Detail

      • onPreExecute

        public abstract void onPreExecute()
        Runs on main thread before background thread starts

      • doInBackground

        public abstract void doInBackground()
        Runs on background thread. This executes after onPreExecute() and before onPostExecute().

      • onPostExecute

        public abstract void onPostExecute()
        Runs after background thread ends on the main thread

      • progressCallback

        public abstract void progressCallback(P... params)
        Use this to update anything on the main thread as the background thread runs (this is a callback, DO NOT CALL THIS DIRECTLY)
        Parameters:
        params - parameters to pass, can be anything you want.

      • publishProgress

        public void publishProgress(P... params)
        Call this to publish progress to the main thread
        Parameters:
        params - parameters to pass, can be anything you want

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Start the Async Task

      • setDaemon

        public void setDaemon(boolean daemon)
        Set if this should be a daemon thread or not
        Parameters:
        daemon - is daemon?
        See Also:
        Thread#setDaemon(boolean)}

      • interrupt

        public void interrupt()
        Interrupt the thread.
        See Also:
        Thread#interrupt()}
